#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
int t,i;
cin>>t;
for(i=0;i<t;i++)
{
string s1;
cin>>s1;
int flag=0;
//while(s1[j])
for(int j=0;j<s1.length();j++)
{
if(s1[j]=='a' || s1[j]=='e' || s1[j]=='i' || s1[j]=='o' || s1[j]== 'u'){
flag =1;
break;
}
}


if(flag==1)
cout<<"yes\n";
else
cout<<"no\n";
}
return 0;
}
